short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A to-do list that helps you finish difficult projects by helping you prioritize and focus on what matters.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
PushList PRO

* A clever to-do app that helps you finish difficult projects
* Helps you prioritize tasks and focus on what's important
* Estimates the impact of your current task on the project
* Supports multiple lists
* Is always at hand when you need it
